price: Ano ang maidudulot para sa kanya ng yaman niya kapag nabulid siya [sa Impiyerno]?
arabic: وَمَا يُغۡنِي عَنۡهُ مَالُهُۥٓ إِذَا تَرَدَّىٰٓ

version.title: Filipino (Tagalog) Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Tagalog by Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: wamā yugh'nī ʿanhu māluhu idhā taraddā
